A metal flask containing Zone-produced vodka. The smell is extraordinarily pungent, the taste is described as burning with notes of pine, hints of maple syrup, and earthy tones. Popular among some factions as a rite of passage. The origins of its distillation are unknown though there are countless rumours of its production process and used ingredients. The vodka is shipped by masked couriers to traders in regular intervals. Common rumors say the product originates from a hidden distillery in the northern corners of the Zone, lacking explanations on how to supply such a remote set-up.

A strong carbonated energy drink with added sugar. Commonly used by stalkers on long trips due to its alertness-boosting effects. It is a highly refreshing, popular beverage with an overwhelmingly sweet and slightly acidic taste. Besides its positive cognitive effects, it also reduces the effects of alcohol intoxication. Should be consumed in moderation.

A pack of Ukrainian brand coffee beans. Contains a dark roast house blend of part Arabica, part Robusta beans with a piercing aroma, a recognizable smell around many camps in the Zone, perfectly suited for welcoming the day's first radiant beams. Tasting notes: Hints of barley and vanilla with undertones of pine and ash.

An imported can of milk coffee, ready to drink. Brewed from Arabica coffee beans, sweetened, mixed with oat milk, and packed in a can. Generally considered below average in taste for coffee consumed in the Zone, but valued for its long shelf life and ease of consumption compared to self-brewed coffee.
